snippet.title: LET ME OUT - Release date trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to escape a cursed village, filled with demons because Let Me Out by 4Happy Studio is coming on Steam on AUGUST 8TH!
Wishlist NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1269520/Let_Me_Out/
🧩 Enter the eerie world of Alvin, a 10-year-old indigo child in this chilling mystery puzzle game
🕷️ Uncover dark secrets & exorcize sinister demons with help from your sister’s spirit & your pet spider

Will you survive the nightmare?

🕷️ What LET ME OUT is about?
Play as Alvin, a 10-year-old indigo child, in search of his mother and escape Mata Koetjhing, an ancient Javanese village. Get help from your little sister’s spirit, your pet spider and brew potions to exorcize mysterious creatures.

#mysterygaming #horrorgaming #puzzlegame
